products.description: Frogg Toggs Waterproof Rain Suit ? Size Large (Jacket + Pants),Black with gray trim ? Unisex fit ? Size: L, Used once ? excellent condition, Lightweight 2-piece rain gear set that keeps you dry without the bulk. 100% waterproof & wind-resistant, Full zip jacket with snap storm flap, Elastic waist pants with pockets + adjustable leg cuffs, Packs down small ? easy to store in a backpack, saddlebag, or vehicle, Great for motorcycle riding, hunting, fishing, yard work, camping, sports events, job sites, etc.
